Package index

Package Overview

Package-level documentation

didTEnets-package didTEnets
didTEnets: Transfer Entropy-Informed Difference-in-Differences for Network Analysis

Data Acquisition

Functions for downloading and preparing financial and policy data

download_financial_data()
Download Financial Data for TE-DiD Analysis
create_policy_data()
Create Enhanced Policy Data

Transfer Entropy Analysis

Core transfer entropy calculation and analysis functions

calculate_enhanced_transfer_entropy()
Calculate Enhanced Transfer Entropy
calculate_te_matrices_by_period()
Calculate Transfer Entropy Matrices by Period

Network Analysis

Network weight calculation and network statistics

calculate_network_weights()
Calculate Network Weights
calculate_network_statistics()
Calculate Network Statistics

Policy Impact Measures

Calculate NICI and NIPI for TE-DiD analysis

calculate_nici()
Calculate Network-Informed Contagion Index (NICI)
calculate_nipi()
Calculate Network-Informed Policy Intensity (NIPI)

Econometric Models

TE-DiD model estimation and data preparation

estimate_tedid_model()
Estimate TE-DiD Model
prepare_tedid_dataset()
Prepare TE-DiD Dataset
extract_tedid_results()
Extract TE-DiD Results

Visualization

Create comprehensive plots and network visualizations

visualize_tedid_results()
Visualize TE-DiD Results
create_te_heatmaps()
Create Transfer Entropy Heatmaps
create_network_comparison()
Create Network Comparison Visualizations

Complete Analysis

Wrapper functions for end-to-end analysis

run_complete_tedid_analysis()
Run Complete TE-DiD Analysis
